4230.verse: فَقَضَـٰهُنَّ|Then He completed them|186|194|15235$سَبْعَ|(as) seven|91|106|303$سَمَـٰوَاتٍ|heavens|101|116|15236$فِى|in|48|63|89$يَوْمَيْنِ|two periods|97|112|1792$وَأَوْحَىٰ|and He revealed|127|134|10032$فِى|in|48|60|89$كُلِّ|each|52|76|185$سَمَآءٍ|heaven|70|94|15237$أَمْرَهَا‌ۚ|its affair.|80|104|15238$وَزَيَّنَّا|And We adorned|129|153|15239$ٱلسَّمَآءَ|the heaven,|100|124|5426$ٱلدُّنْيَا|the nearest,|102|114|818$بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ|with lamps|108|128|15240$وَحِفْظًا‌ۚ|and (to) guard.|122|163|14568$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|105|28$تَقْدِيرُ|(is the) Decree|120|161|5867$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|(of) the All-Mighty,|148|168|3257$ٱلْعَلِيمِ|the All-Knower.|122|122|5868$

4231.verse: فَإِنْ|But if|55|66|227$أَعْرَضُواْ|they turn away,|127|149|13480$فَقُلْ|then say,|83|105|2705$أَنذَرْتُكُمْ|`I have warned you|152|174|15241$صَـٰعِقَةً|(of) a thunderbolt|139|161|15242$مِّثْلَ|like|57|68|1052$صَـٰعِقَةِ|(the) thunderbolt|135|225|15243$عَادٍ|(of) Aad|75|254|1497$وَثَمُودَ|and Thamud.|106|196|7735$

4232.verse: إِذْ|When|57|66|1198$جَآءَتْهُمُ|came to them|112|130|1861$ٱلرُّسُلُ|the Messengers|124|142|3325$مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ|from before them|159|177|14441$وَمِنْ|and from|78|96|1133$خَلْفِهِمْ|behind them,|106|115|3500$أَلَّا|(saying) `Do not|131|138|2011$تَعْبُدُوٓاْ|worship|81|95|8359$إِلَّا|but|42|56|86$ٱللَّهَ‌ۖ|Allah.`|64|78|184$قَالُواْ|They said,|89|103|101$لَوْ|`If|41|55|905$شَآءَ|(had) willed|97|111|2277$رَبُّنَا|our Lord,|79|86|1253$لَأَنزَلَ|surely, He (would have) sent down|252|259|12257$مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً|Angels.|80|94|12258$فَإِنَّا|So indeed, we|114|128|4856$بِمَآ|in what|69|84|43$أُرْسِلْتُم|you have been sent|152|159|9533$بِهِۦ|with|52|290|204$كَـٰفِرُونَ|(are) disbelievers.`|147|385|6416$

4234.verse: فَأَرْسَلْنَا|So We sent|97|105|6745$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|106|22$رِيحًا|a wind|68|84|13768$صَرْصَرًا|furious|113|129|15244$فِىٓ|in|48|64|89$أَيَّامٍ|(the) days|90|106|1585$نَّحِسَاتٍ|(of) misfortune,|124|132|15245$لِّنُذِيقَهُمْ|that We may make them taste|223|240|15246$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|167|1786$ٱلْخِزْىِ|(of) disgrace|105|138|8323$فِى|in|48|81|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|99|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۖ|(of) the world.|117|134|818$وَلَعَذَابُ|And surely, (the) punishment|213|247|9480$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(of) the Hereafter|139|173|978$أَخْزَىٰ‌ۖ|(is) more disgracing,|155|172|15247$وَهُمْ|and they|79|306|256$لَا يُنصَرُونَ|will not be helped.|141|368|15248$

4235.verse: وَأَمَّا|And as for|88|98|269$ثَمُودُ|Thamud,|77|98|8716$فَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمْ|We guided them,|132|153|15249$فَٱسْتَحَبُّواْ|but they preferred|142|163|15250$ٱلْعَمَىٰ|[the] blindness|119|140|15251$عَلَى|over|63|73|52$ٱلْهُدَىٰ|the guidance,|111|117|1113$فَأَخَذَتْهُمْ|so seized them|119|132|15252$صَـٰعِقَةُ|a thunderbolt|109|122|15253$ٱلْعَذَابِ|(of) the punishment|152|165|482$ٱلْهُونِ|humiliating,|94|107|15254$بِمَا|for what|76|82|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|348|94$يَكْسِبُونَ|earn.|97|328|759$

4237.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And (the) Day|114|121|819$يُحْشَرُ|will be gathered|125|138|15256$أَعْدَآءُ|(the) enemies|112|125|15257$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|94|606$إِلَى|to|53|66|118$ٱلنَّارِ|the Fire,|76|89|410$فَهُمْ|then they|85|92|152$يُوزَعُونَ|will be assembled in rows,|191|191|13133$

4238.verse: حَتَّىٰٓ|Until,|64|79|526$إِذَا مَا|when|74|104|5236$جَآءُوهَا|they come to it|123|153|15044$شَهِدَ|(will) testify|100|130|1598$عَلَيْهِمْ|against them|106|136|22$سَمْعُهُمْ|their hearing,|108|123|15258$وَأَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ|and their sight,|124|139|15259$وَجُلُودُهُم|and their skins,|121|150|15260$بِمَا|(as) to what|104|133|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|146|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|107|912$

4230.verse: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

4231.verse: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.

4232.verse: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers."

4233.verse: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.

4234.verse: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped.

4235.verse: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn.

4236.verse: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.

4237.verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are [driven] assembled in rows,

4238.verse: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do.
